summary: Repairs and marbleizes the Statues of Dibella.
descriptionHtml:
Repaired Statue of Dibella
ver 1.3

This is a very simple texture mod to repair the damage to all Dibella statues in the game.  It removes cracks and most watermarks.  There are three versions available:
1. a \"stone\" version that keeps the majority of the original texture intact
2. a \"marble\" version that changes to the stone to a rose marble
3. a \"granite\" version that changes to the stone to a granite look

See the uploaded screenshots for images.  Obviously you can only use one of these at a time.

Since the stone and gold statues of Dibella share the same normal map, I modified the texture for the two small golden statues (one without jewels and the one with jewels) as well to be more golden, and more metallic (reflective).

Installation:
You can use the Nexus Mod Manager to install, or you can copy the Data directory to your Skyrim directory.

Uninstall:
Use NMM to uninstall, or manually delete the \"textures/clutter/statues\" directory.

Conflicts:
Of course, any other mod that modifies these textures will conflict.

Versions:
1.0 - first version
1.1 - reduced shinyness; added granite version
1.2 - added \"stone\" version
1.3 - updated the gold jeweled statue as well
author: tolborg
